title: Drawing, "Shelving Unit", ca. 1935
medium: Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at center: BLEACHED MAHOGANY/GRAIN VERTICALLY/ TWO PL. GLASS SHELVES POL. EDGES/2" DIA. POL. CHROM. TUBE/REFLECTOR IN TOP/ETCHED GLASS-ONE SIDE/FLUSHED OPAL UNDER; inscribed in graphite circled at lower right: 8473/A; inscribed in graphite at lower right: R.C.-34"H./SOFA-32+1/2"; inscribed in graphite at upper margin right: 70=; inscribed dimensions, calculations
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for end table/shelving unit. Top surface with reflector; two glass shelves below connected at left by polished tubular chrome support. Top surface, side, and base below in bleached mahogany.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Shelving Unit", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-893.
